sense.name: pulsate
sense.examples: The bruise above her eye continued to throb. Each throb of cardiac muscle is miraculous. A dull song began to throb out of the caf speakers. Each step made her head throb. The pain under her fingertip throbbed. The spring morning seemed to throb with innumerable beginnings. Her head was beginning to throb under the weight of her wig and bonnet
